name: SpeechPro
content: SpeechPro is an AI based language learning coach. The project is based on React Native and uses Recoil for state management. I'm currently working as one of the maintainers - primarily handling android side of the project including bug fixes and implementing new features.

name: DBViewer
content: DBViewer is an android application with more than 10k+ downloads and around 3k active users. It is an application that lets the users interact with MS Access databases. The project makes use of Flutter to create UI and frontend logic, Java to handle database itself, and provider as a state management solution.

name: Ultrablock (Adblocker)
content: Ultrablock is an adblocking chrome extension. This project helped me understand typescript, improve my javascript concepts and understand how the DOM can be accessed and manipulated using chrome extensions.

name: Inspire Me
content: My very first chrome extension I developed a while back when I was trying to learn JavaScript. The main purpose of the extension was to allow front-end developers easily save their favorite website designs with just one click. The extension enables users to capture the visible part of a webpage, get the list of fonts used on the website, and get the color scheme being employed.
